value.string:
print "#### Indexing translations ####"
 context.ERP5Site_updateTranslationTable(sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id)
 
 print "#### Indexing categories ####"
 context.portal_categories.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_categories.objectValues()):
 o.recursiveReindexObject(after_tag='module',tag='category', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 print "#### Indexing preferences ####"
 context.portal_preferences.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_preferences.objectValues()):
 o.recursiveReindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # We index simulation first to make sure we can calculate tests (ie. related quantity)
 print "#### Indexing simulation ####"
 context.portal_simulation.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_simulation.objectValues()):
 o.recursiveReindexObject(after_tag=('module','category','document'),tag='simulation',priority=3, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # We index templates secondly
 print "#### Indexing templates ####"
 context.portal_templates.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_templates.objectValues()):
 o.reindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # Next we index trash bins
 print "#### Indexing trash bins ####"
 context.portal_trash.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_trash.objectValues()):
 o.reindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # Next we index domains
 print "#### Indexing domains ####"
 context.portal_domains.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_domains.objectValues()):
 o.reindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # Next we index applied rules
 print "#### Indexing applied rules ####"
 context.portal_rules.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_rules.objectValues()):
 o.recursiveReindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # Next we index delivery builders
 print "#### Indexing delivery builders ####"
 context.portal_deliveries.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_deliveries.objectValues()):
 o.reindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # Next we index order builders
 print "#### Indexing order builders ####"
 context.portal_orders.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(context.portal_orders.objectValues()):
 o.reindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # Then we index everything except inventories
 for folder in context.portal_url.getPortalObject().objectValues(("ERP5 Folder",)):
 print "#### Indexing contents inside folder %s ####" % folder.id
 if folder.getId() not in ('inventory_module',):
 folder.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(folder.objectValues()):
 try:
 o.recursiveReindexObject(after_tag=('module','category'),tag='document',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 except:
 #raise RuntimeError, o.getRelativeUrl()
 raise
 raise RuntimeError, 'error: folder=%s, o=%s' % (repr(folder.getId()), repr(o))
 
 # Then we index inventories
 for folder in context.portal_url.getPortalObject().objectValues(("ERP5 Folder",)):
 if folder.getId() in ('inventory_module',):
 print "#### Indexing contents inside folder %s ####" % folder.id
 folder.reindexObject(tag='module', sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 for o in list(folder.objectValues()):
 o.recursiveReindexObject(after_tag=('module','document','category'),tag='inventory',priority=2, sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 # start activty from simulation because the erp5site is not an active object
 context.portal_simulation.activate(after_tag=('inventory','simulation'),priority=3).InventoryModule_reindexMovementList(sql_catalog_id=sql_catalog_id, passive_commit=passive_commit)
 
 return printed
